about_the_game:
This is the "pc-only" edition! You need one player in VR to play the game! To get full access to the game and play as VR you need the DLC: VR TRIBES - THE VR EDITION!

Challenge VR players in this epic VR vs non-VR multiplayer showdown!

Step into the fast-paced world of VR Tribes as a swift non-VR player, teaming up with others to face off against the powerful VR player, the mighty "Meteor." Use your unique abilities and strategic moves to keep the VR player on their toes. Can you and your friends bring down the Meteor?

Features

  • 4 immersive maps for a varied and exciting battle experience

  • Dynamic multiplayer modes: 3 vs 1 | 2 vs 1 | 1 vs 1

  • Cross-platform action: Compete against VR players on Steam or Meta Quest (coming soon), and join friends from your PC, tablet, or phone - ideal for couch parties or connecting worldwide!

As a non-VR player

  • Outsmart the VR player with special abilities like cloning, hiding and shielding

  • Fly around using a jetpack for swift and evasive maneuvers

  • Launch powerful cannon attacks to knock the VR player off their position

The VR Player

  • Will face you from their 360° mode in stunning miniature worlds

  • Can grab, punch and throw you as non-VR players, adding a unique VR twist to the battle

  • Is able to unlock a powerful arsenal of tools, including guns and laser eyes

Important Notes

  • VR Tribes requires an internet connection and at least one other player

  • For the best experience on tablets or phones, we recommend using an additional gamepad

  • This is the "pc-only" edition! You’ll need at least one player in VR to play the game!

  • To get full access to the game and play as the VR player, you’ll need VR TRIBES and the DLC: VR TRIBES - THE VR EDITION (available on Steam) or VR TRIBES on the Meta Quest Store (coming soon)

  • We are still in Early Access! The full release is planned for early 2025. If you have any questions, suggestions, bug reports, or feedback - or just want to hang out with other players - join our Discord community!

  • To get full access to the game and play as the VR player, you’ll need VR TRIBES and the DLC: VR TRIBES - THE VR EDITION (available on Steam) or VR TRIBES on the Meta Quest Store (coming soon)

name: VR TRIBES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Step into the fast-paced world of VR Tribes as a swift non-VR player, teaming up with others to face off against the powerful VR player, the mighty "Meteor." Use your unique abilities and strategic moves to keep the VR player on their toes. Can you and your friends bring down the Meteor?
